basics.name: Jose Ramirez Mora
basics.label: Staff Frontend Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Staff frontend engineer building performant and maintainable web applications. I deeply care about long-term solutions with great usability, quality, performance and creating an amazing tech culture. I enjoy being challenged and engaging with projects that require me to work outside my knowledge set as well as provide suitable solutions. I strongly believe in constant educational growth through online resources.

work.name: DAZN
work.description: Sports streaming and video on demand
highlights: An active contributor to ongoing initiatives of a team of 10+ engineers.
Participate in multiple Engineering and Product, providing tech perspective and vision ensuring alignment and communication for ongoing projects and initiatives.
Design and contribute to CI solution for a Monorepo project which smartly runs only the changed packages and services ensuring a fast and reliable CI/CD pipeline.
Encourage and promote the design system library as a way of separating concerns from business logic, improve brand standards and user experience.
Contribute to process improvements and automation of multiple cross-team libraries.

work.name: DAZN
work.description: Sports streaming and video on demand
highlights: Deliver multiple features for the DAZN Landing Pages micro frontend, using React, Typescript, and CSS-in-JS.
Create Design tokens naming standardization proposal for the DAZN Design System.
Lead and contribute to a new design system for DAZN web applications, implementing essential atomic components and design tokens, documentation and automation.
Present in the Frontend Guild and tech council, sharing knowledge about frontend technologies and different ongoing projects.
Lead and contribute to a new library to standardize formatting dates, times and currencies across multiple teams and projects ensuring consistency.

work.name: Travix
highlights: Organize collaboration meetings between multiple frontend teams.
Active participant of the performance guild.
Create multiple proposals for different upcoming and ongoing technical challenges.
Design a responsive desktop solution for the new platform.
Mentored individuals in and outside the company and technically led a product team through major development cycles.

work.name: Travix
highlights: Designed backend for frontend, adopted by the entire platform.
Creator of a common internal logging library for server and client-side aligning logging standards and capabilities across the company.
Contributed to a new architecture development of a dynamic frontend platform and design system in React and Typescript.

work.name: Travix
highlights: Setup new frontend observability metrics.
Maintained legacy observability services written in golang.
Part of a product team working on cross-sell products for the company.

work.name: First Factory
highlights: Lead a team internally for multiple clients based in NYC.
Collaboration and decision in web apps architecture for multiple projects
Deliver multiple frontend projects in React, Angular and Nodejs.
Mentor engineers spanning multiple teams and projects.
Create multiple prototypes for mobile and web apps.
Contribute to practice management software for healthcare written in Angular 1.x and C#.

work.name: GBSYS
highlights: Contributed to a web application in ASP.NET(C#).
Contributed to Titanium Appcelerator mobile application.

work.name: 3WV

Contributed to desktop application in C# .NET.

education.institution: Universidad Latinoamerica de Ciencia y Tecnologia

projects.name: Storybook Paddings Addon
projects.description: A Storybook addon to add different paddings to your preview. Useful for checking how components behave when surrounded by white space.
